Package common

Interface IGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public interface IGroup
extends java.io.Serializable
    ITeam keeps track of the IMember stubs of the members in the team and defines how communication with those members can occur. Each instance of ITeam needs a unique id. IMember stubs are added to the team via a "Join" message (a known message type). Similarly, IMember stubs can leave a team using a "Leave" message (another known message type). So, we don't need add() or leave() methods in this interface.
